name: A Deadly Game
description:
This is my submission for the Wowie Jam 3.0. You play as a boss who needs to fight against the hero. The game is inspired by rock-paper-scissors. You and the hero share the same three attacks and the rock-paper-scissors rules are:

Quick Attack beats Heavy Attack.

Heavy Attack beats Ranged Attack. 

Ranged Attack beats Quick Attack.

Ties go the player.

I hope you enjoy the game!

Keyboard Controls:

-WASD to move

-"J" = Quick Attack

-"K" = Heavy Attack

-"L" = Ranged Attack

-"Tab" = Restart the level In case of unforeseen bugs

Controller Controls:

-D-PAD to move

-Xbox A/PlayStation X = Quick Attack

-Xbox X/PlayStation Square = Heavy Attack

-Xbox B/PlayStation O = Ranged Attack

-Xbox Y/PlayStation Triangle = Restart the level In case of unforeseen bugs
